it.polimi.se2018.alternative_network.client.socket

Class SocketClient2

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.alternative_network.client.AbstractClient2
      • it.polimi.se2018.alternative_network.client.socket.SocketClient2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SocketClient2
extends AbstractClient2
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class based on the Abstract Factory Design Pattern. The class define the Socket client for every single player. Extends AbstractClient class in order to implement and facilitate Client connection.
    Author:
    DavideMammarella

      • SocketClient2

        public SocketClient2(java.lang.String ip_host,
                     int port,
                     UIInterface view)
        Socket Client constructor.
        Parameters:
        ip_host - client interface, used as controller to communicate with the client.
        port - server address.
        view - port used from server to communicate.

      • connectToServer2

        public void connectToServer2()
        Specified by:

      • run

        public void run()
        Runner for Response Listener thread. Method that define the listener for the server response. This method will start a thread that will be on hold for a message from server, and will manage it with the protocol.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        See Also:
        Thread.run()
